item.description: Structure Fire; INC#1550; 09:39PM; 300 E Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3L4WYG7; Historic South-Central; Firefighters responded to a three story, center hall apartment building with nothing showing upon arrival. Fire attack made entry and located smoke from one unit. Inside the unit they found 'food on the stove'. There was no fire, only the smoke from the burnt food. Upon searching the unit, they located an adult patient down on the bathroom floor. Firefighter/Paramedics immediately initiated advanced life saving medical aid. Sadly, the patient was determined dead on scene and not considered to be related to the smoke in the unit. (age/gender unknown at this time). The incident will be turned over to LAPD and LA County Coroner for the death investigation. The 9-1-1 call was received at 9:13PM. No further details.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 E14 E209 E210 E9 RA10 RA810 T10 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1358; 06:48PM; 1520 S Purdue Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3k3Lmak; Sawtelle; KNOCKDOWN: The first arriving 29 firefighters (prior to 2nd alarm arrival) extinguished the fire in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained and prevented from extending into the adjacent units. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC9 E19 E237 E263 E292 E59 E62 E71 RA37 RA837 T37 T63 T92; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1358; 06:30PM; 1520 S Purdue Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3k3Lmak; Sawtelle; Two story, garden style apartment building with one unit (on the 2nd floor) well involved. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. Additional resources requested. (reflected in this alert); FS 59; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC18 BC4 BC5 BC9 CM42 E19 E205 E237 E269 E292 E295 E43 E5 E59 E62 E71 EM9 HR3 RA37 RA837 T37 T5 T69 T92 T95 UR5 UR88; CH7; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1285; 05:52PM; 2034 E Violet St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vtsW8c; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: 39 firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 mins with no injuries reported. There was a small amount of extension into one structure (contents only). One additional vehicle was destroyed by fire, next to the RV. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E17 E202 E209 E4 E9 RA17 RA209 SQ21 T2 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1285; 05:35PM; 915 S Santa Fe Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ou5q3B; Downtown; RV in an alley is fully involved in fire and exposing a commercial building. Firefighters are getting water on the fire and are also checking for possible extension into the building. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E17 E202 E209 E4 E9 RA17 RA209 SQ21 T2 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Red Line vs Pedestrian; INC#0995; 02:29PM; 899 W 7th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/2UzBdZG; Downtown; Firefighters are on scene and located one person under the train, in critical condition. The patient was not entrapped and was removed from under the train. Firefighter/paramedics are providing advanced life-saving care as the patient is readied for transport. Age/gender is unknown at this time. Any further questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 2901 and Metro Los Angeles.; FS 9; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC13 E13 E203 E210 E211 E215 E9 EM1 HR3 RA10 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T3 T9; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0901; 01:53PM; 3614 S Meier St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vE6cml; Mar Vista; KNOCKDOWN: The first arriving 29 firefighters (prior to the added companies) extinguished the fire in 19 minutes. Fire attack was not able to make entry through the front due to excessive storage conditions and redirected to an alternate entry. Once inside, they were able to extinguish with no injuries reported. The cause of the fire and dollar loss is TBD. No further details.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 BC9 CM42 E19 E205 E237 E292 E43 E59 E62 EM9 RA43 RA59 T37 T5 T92; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0901; 01:34PM; 3614 S Meier St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vE6cml; Mar Vista; One story, single family dwelling (approx 1,100sq ft) with light smoke showing. Firefighters are encountering difficulties making entry and locating the source due to excessive storage conditions inside. The truck company has two heat holes open with steady, pressurized smoke showing. No other buildings exposed. One additional task force requested (reflected in this alert).; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E237 E292 E43 E59 E62 RA43 RA59 T37 T92 E19 LF5 CM42 EM9 E62; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Operation; INC#0405; 08:47AM; 2699 N Westridge Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vywaYm; Brentwood; LAFD Air Ops is conducting a hoist operation to retrieve and transport an adult male mountain biker with a non-life threatening injury. The 9-1-1 call was received at 8:21AM. No further details.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E269 E69 H1 H3 HA1 HA3 RA69 RH114 T69; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1436; 08:26PM; 730 S Manhattan Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OrdVNa; Koreatown; KNOCKDOWN: 73 firefighters extinguished the fire in just 23 minutes. Crews held the blaze and prevented it from extending to the exposed building. No injuries reported. The cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 29; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 4; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM22 E10 E13 E211 E226 E227 E229 E26 E261 E27 E29 E52 EM1 EM11 EM14 HR3 RA26 RA29 RA52 RA826 SQ21 T11 T26 T27 T29 T61 UR27 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart
